item.title: 欧盟将对超过 280 亿美元的美国商品征收反关税
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三在一份声明中表示，欧盟将从下月起对价值260亿欧元（约合283.3亿美元）的美国商品征收反关税，以回应美国对钢铁和铝征收的关税。【原文：The European Union will impose counter tariffs on 26 billion euros ($28.33 billion) worth of U.S. goods from next month in response to U.S. tariffs on steel and aluminium, the European Commission said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: Spotify 称 2024 年将支付 100 亿美元版税
item.description: Spotify 周三表示，它将在 2024 年支付 100 亿美元的版税，这是音乐行业单年支付的最大一笔版税。【原文：Spotify said on Wednesday it paid $10 billion in royalties in 2024, the largest payout to the music industry in a single year.】

item.title: 国泰航空 2024 年利润微增
item.description: 香港国泰航空公司（Cathay Pacific Airways）周三公布，由于假日旅游需求增加和燃油价格下降，公司下半年业绩走强，全年利润略有增长。【原文：Hong Kong's Cathay Pacific Airways reported a marginal rise in its full-year profit on Wednesday, following a stronger second half due to a holiday-season boost in travel demand and lower fuel prices.】

item.title: 特朗普钢铝关税生效，美加贸易战愈演愈烈
item.description: 随着先前的豁免、免税配额和产品排除条款的到期，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提高钢铁和铝进口关税的措施于周三生效，他重新制定有利于美国的全球贸易准则的活动也在加紧进行。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's increased tariffs on steel and aluminum imports took effect on Wednesday as prior exemptions, duty free quotas and product exclusions expired, as his campaign to reorder global trade norms in favor of the U.S. stepped up.】

item.title: 洞察力：力拓旗舰铁矿石项目的致命成本
item.description: 阿尔塞尼-卡马拉（Alseny Camara）的一次例行夜班以悲剧收场。【原文：A routine night shift ended in tragedy for Alseny Camara.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称台积电向英伟达、AMD 和博通推荐英特尔代工合资公司
item.description: 据四位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，台积电已向美国芯片设计商英伟达（Nvidia）、先进微器件（Advanced Micro Devices）和博通（Broadcom）提出入股合资企业的建议，该合资企业将运营英特尔的工厂。【原文：TSMC has pitched U.S. chip designers Nvidia , Advanced Micro Devices and Broadcom about taking stakes in a joint venture that would operate Intel's factories, according to four sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛将标准普尔 500 指数 2025 年年底目标下调至 6200 点
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）在 3 月 11 日的一份报告中将 2025 年 S&P 500 指数的年终目标从 6,500 点下调至 6,200 点，理由是政策的不确定性主要与关税和对经济增长前景的担忧有关。【原文：Goldman Sachs has trimmed its 2025 year-end target for the S&P 500 Index to 6,200 from 6,500 in a note dated March 11, citing policy uncertainty largely related to tariffs and concerns about the economic growth outlook.】

item.title: 交易所高管表示，澳大利亚将考虑首次允许双类股票上市
item.description: 据澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）的一位高管透露，澳大利亚证券交易所正在考虑首次允许双层股票上市，因为该交易所运营商和企业监管机构正试图重振澳大利亚萎靡不振的上市市场。【原文：The Australian Securities Exchange is considering allowing dual-class shares to be listed for the first time as the exchange operator and corporate regulator try to revive the nation's flatlining listings market, according to an ASX executive.】

item.title: Reliance Jio 与马斯克的 Starlink 公司合作，在印度提供卫星互联网服务
item.description: 印度信实吉奥公司（Reliance Jio）周三表示，它与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）签署了一项协议，将Starlink的互联网服务引入印度，一天前，竞争对手巴蒂电信公司（Bharti Airtel）也签署了类似协议。【原文：India's Reliance Jio said on Wednesday it signed a deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink's internet services to India, a day after rival Bharti Airtel inked a similar pact.】

item.title: 加拿大能源部长称渥太华将应对美国的任何关税措施
item.description: 加拿大能源部长乔纳森-威尔金森（Jonathan Wilkinson）周二告诉美国有线电视新闻网（CNN），加拿大将在短期内对美国征收的任何关税做出回应，同时还补充说，加拿大并不希望加剧或挑起两国之间的贸易紧张局势。【原文：Canadian Energy Minister Jonathan Wilkinson told CNN on Tuesday his country will respond shortly to any tariffs from the U.S. while also adding Canada was not looking to escalate or provoke trade tensions between the two countries.】

item.title: 欧元因乌克兰停火提议大涨，关税挤压股市
item.description: 周三，欧元因乌克兰准备接受为期一个月的停火协议而站上五个月高位，而股市则因美国关税计划的反反复复以及对美国经济放缓的担忧而大幅波动。【原文：The euro was riding at five-month highs on Wednesday on Ukraine's readiness to accept a month-long ceasefire, while stocks whipsawed on back-and-forth U.S. tariff plans and concern about a U.S. economic slowdown.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 弗吉尼亚州州长称美国必须发展核聚变，否则将在能源方面落后于中国
item.description: 弗吉尼亚州州长格伦-扬金（Glenn Youngkin）周二在休斯敦举行的CERAWeek能源会议上说，美国必须加快聚变能源的开发，否则就有可能在能源主导地位上落后于中国。【原文：The United States must expedite its development of fusion energy or risk falling behind China on energy dominance, said Virginia Governor Glenn Youngkin at the CERAWeek energy conference in Houston on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普关税加剧经济忧虑，美元处于守势
item.description: 周三，美元兑主要同业汇率在五个月低点附近徘徊，因为在唐纳德-特朗普总统不可预测的贸易政策影响下，对美国经济的担忧持续升温。【原文：The dollar languished near a five-month low versus major peers on Wednesday, as worries about the U.S. economy continued to simmer under President Donald Trump's unpredictable trade policies.】

item.title: 油价因美元疲软而上涨，但对关税影响的担忧限制了涨幅
item.description: 周三早盘，在美元走软的助推下，油价有所上扬，但市场对美国经济放缓和关税对全球经济增长影响的担忧加剧，抑制了油价的涨幅。【原文：Oil prices edged up early on Wednesday, helped by a weaker dollar, but mounting fears of a U.S. economic slowdown and the impact of tariffs on global economic growth capped gains.】

item.title: 油价因美元疲软而上涨，但对关税影响的担忧限制了涨幅
item.description: 周三早盘，在美元走软的助推下，油价有所上扬，但市场对美国经济放缓和关税对全球经济增长影响的担忧加剧，抑制了油价的涨幅。【原文：Oil prices edged up early on Wednesday, helped by a weaker dollar, but mounting fears of a U.S. economic slowdown and the impact of tariffs on global economic growth capped gains.】

item.title: 风险投资公司 Bessemer 为第二支印度基金筹资 3.5 亿美元
item.description: Bessemer Venture Partners 是 Swiggy 的早期支持者，该公司在周三的一份声明中表示，已为一支专注于印度的基金筹集了 3.5 亿美元，用于投资人工智能企业、金融科技公司和直接面向消费者的品牌等。【原文：Bessemer Venture Partners, an early backer of Swiggy , has raised $350 million for an India-focused fund to invest in AI-enabled businesses, fintechs and direct-to-consumer brands among others, the company said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟开始征收关税，中国引领电动汽车购买量增长
item.description: 研究公司 Rho Motion 周三表示，尽管欧盟对中国制造的电动汽车征收关税减少了一些品牌电动汽车的销量，但中国 2 月份再次引领了全球电动汽车购买量的增长。【原文：China in February again led purchases of electric vehicles, which increased worldwide versus a year ago, even as European Union tariffs on China-made EVs reduced sales of some brands, research firm Rho Motion said on Wednesday.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 亿万富翁阿加瓦尔可能投资美国石油服务公司以扩大凯恩产量
item.description: 印度最大的私营石油和天然气公司凯恩印度公司（Cairn India）董事长周二表示，该公司可能会投资美国的服务和工程公司，作为在未来几年将产量增长五倍的 50 亿美元计划的一部分。【原文：India's largest privately owned oil and gas company Cairn India said it may invest in U.S. service and engineering companies as part of a $5 billion plan to grow output five-fold in the coming years, its chairman said on Tuesday.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 如果特朗普贸易战升级，加拿大可能限制对美石油出口
item.description: 加拿大能源部长乔纳森-威尔金森（Jonathan Wilkinson）周二表示，如果与美国的贸易争端进一步升级，加拿大可能会采取非关税措施，如限制向美国出口石油或对产品征收出口关税。【原文：Canada could impose non-tariff measures such as restricting its oil exports to the United States or levying export duties on products if a trade dispute with the United States escalates further, Canada's energy minister Jonathan Wilkinson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 如果特朗普贸易战升级，加拿大可能限制对美石油出口
item.description: 加拿大能源部长乔纳森-威尔金森（Jonathan Wilkinson）周二表示，如果与美国的贸易争端进一步升级，加拿大可能会采取非关税措施，如限制向美国出口石油或对产品征收出口关税。【原文：Canada could impose non-tariff measures such as restricting its oil exports to the United States or levying export duties on products if a trade dispute with the United States escalates further, Canada's energy minister Jonathan Wilkinson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 欧洲各国部长和高管表示，如果制裁放松，欧洲将寻求避免使用俄罗斯能源
item.description: 在休斯顿举行的一次会议上，各国部长和高管表示，如果解除制裁，欧洲买家不太可能重返俄罗斯能源行业，因为该集团已通过可再生能源和替代天然气供应商实现了电力结构的多样化。【原文：European buyers are unlikely to return to Russia's energy sector if sanctions are lifted, as the bloc has diversified its power mix with renewable energy and alternative gas suppliers, ministers and executives said at a conference in Houston.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰任命杰森-霍夫（Jason Hoff）担任新设立的北美地区首席执行官一职
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）周二表示，已任命杰森-霍夫（Jason Hoff）从 5 月 1 日起担任新设立的北美地区首席执行官一职，这家德国制造商希望加强对其第二大市场美国的关注。【原文：Mercedes-Benz said on Tuesday it has appointed Jason Hoff to the newly created role of North America CEO, effective May 1 as the German maker looks to strengthen its focus on the U.S., its second-largest market.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，力拓将为收购 Arcadium Lithium 筹集高达 90 亿美元的资金
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，全球最大的铁矿石生产商力拓将发行 90 亿美元的美国投资级债券，为其最近完成的对 Arcadium Lithium 公司的收购寻求资金。【原文：The world's biggest iron ore producer Rio Tinto is offering $9 billion in U.S. investment-grade bonds as the miner seeks funding for its recently-closed buyout of Arcadium Lithium , Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 马斯克呼吁恢复特斯拉 560 亿美元的发薪日
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二开始上诉，试图恢复他从特斯拉获得的 560 亿美元报酬，声称下级法院法官在撤销创纪录的赔偿时犯了多个法律错误。【原文：Elon Musk kicked off his appeal to try to restore his $56 billion payday from Tesla on Tuesday, claiming a lower court judge made multiple legal errors in rescinding the record compensation.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 全球企业关注更多美国投资，特朗普吹捧能源主导地位
item.description: 高管们本周表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易保护主义政策所带来的市场动荡并没有削弱外商对美国能源行业的投资兴趣，他们对特朗普削减法规和支持化石燃料的承诺表示赞赏。【原文：Market upheaval from U.S. President Donald Trump's protectionist trade policies has not dampened foreign investment interest in the U.S. energy industry, executives said this week, as they lauded his promise to cut regulations and support fossil fuels.】

item.title: 肯尼迪要求美国食品公司去除人工染料
item.description: 据路透社看到的一封电子邮件称，美国卫生部长小罗伯特-肯尼迪在周一的一次会议上告诉包括百事可乐和卡夫亨氏在内的食品公司，特朗普政府希望在肯尼迪卸任前食品供应中不再使用人工染料。【原文：U.S. Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. told food companies including PepsiCo and Kraft Heinz in a meeting on Monday that the Trump administration wants artificial dyes out of the food supply before Kennedy leaves office, according to an email seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普排除豁免澳大利亚钢铝关税的可能性
item.description: 澳大利亚媒体援引一位白宫官员的话报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府将于周三对澳大利亚征收钢铝关税，澳大利亚将不会被豁免。【原文：Australia will not be exempt from U.S. steel and aluminium tariffs that President Donald Trump's administration will impose on Wednesday, Australian media reported, citing a White House official.】

item.title: 白宫表示将对钢铁和铝征收 25% 的关税
item.description: 白宫周二表示，对加拿大和美国所有其他贸易伙伴征收25%的钢铝关税将于3月12日午夜生效，没有例外或豁免。【原文：A 25% tariff on steel and aluminum with no exceptions or exemptions will go into effect for Canada and all other U.S. trading partners at midnight on March 12, the White House said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 交易日：关税压倒停火希望，又一片红海
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 在贸易战和业绩不佳的背景下，CERAWEEK Kimmeridge 公司关注更多的加拿大石油和天然气活动
item.description: 金美利奇能源管理公司（Kimmeridge Energy Management）的一位高管周二告诉路透社，该公司将在加拿大石油和天然气生产商中采取更积极的行动，因为该公司的目标是业绩不佳的公司以及与美国的贸易战可能带来的利益。【原文：Kimmeridge Energy Management will pursue more activism among Canadian oil and gas producers, a senior executive told Reuters on Tuesday, as it targets underperforming companies and potential benefits emanating from the trade war with the United States.】
